survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Online Grocery Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand customer satisfaction levels with online grocery delivery services, focusing on delivery experience, product quality, and overall service.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to categorize usage frequency. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following online grocery delivery services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected any option other than 'This is my first time' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to capture multiple services used. Include an 'Other' option for additional responses.

script.question_text: Which of the following online grocery delivery services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected any option other than 'This is my first time' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of products received through online grocery delivery?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected any option other than 'This is my first time' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

questions.question_text: What aspects of online grocery delivery services do you find most convenient?
